## StateChanges interface

Represents a state change containing changed state and responsible action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StateChanges<TState> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [action](./state-management.statechanges.action.md) | [StateAction](./state-management.stateaction.md) | The action that caused the state changes |
|  [state](./state-management.statechanges.state.md) | Partial&lt;TState&gt; | The state that changed |
